title: The Manual: 8 best men's fragrances and grey hair products to buy now, according to The Telegraph's grooming expert
text:
On the hunt for a new men's grooming essential? Every fortnight, our grooming expert, Lee Kynaston, will be rounding up the best grooming products that have earned his seal of approval.

From fragrances that offer strong staying power to hair products that embrace your hair's silver linings, these are the 8 products to invest in now.

Scents with staying power

When it comes to fragrance, most men I know like their smelly stuff to resemble a marathon runner – with strength and stamina topping the list of essential attributes.

Little wonder, then, that sales of men’s eau de parfum (a fragrance concentration stronger and usually longer-lasting than traditional eau de toilette) are up 36 per cent...
